main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Andover, Massachusetts on May 20, 1964, described as a dime-sized 'V' that suddenly accelerated and disappeared.
interesting points: The observed object was compared to a B-52 aircraft at high altitude without control., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 seconds., A bright cigar-shaped object was reported over Nashua, New Hampshire at 9:10 PM on 4/20/64., Witnesses reported seeing a strange light hovering in the sky on May 11, 1964, in South Lawrence, Massachusetts., The object made no sound during the sighting.
witness description: A 16-year-old male who observed the object along with others.
